content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "lilac", "quantity": 37, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_fan", "quantity": 48, "index": 18}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 28}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft a turtle helmet, I need to place scute in the first and last row of the crafting table. There is 1 scute in slot 38, so I will move it to the first row of the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: turtle_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lilac", "quantity": 37, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_fan", "quantity": 48, "index": 18}, {"type": "acacia_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 50, "index": 28}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that the scute is in the first row, I need to place another scute in the second row. I will move the scute from slot 38 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1
